task.name: browsetable
task.shortdescription: Browse a table (MS, calibration table, image)
task.description: This task brings up a browser that can open and display any CASA table. The tablename can be specified at startup, or any table can be loaded after the browser comes up.

param.name: tablename
param.description:
Name of table file (vis, calibration table, image) Default: none
Example: tablename='ngc5921.ms'

param.name: mightedit
param.shortdescription: Warning: the GUI seems to ignore whether the table tool is opened read-only. Just be careful, esp. if filtering.
param.description:
Disable the filtering options (below) and allow editing the table. Default: False Options: False|True
Warning: the GUI seems to ignore whether the table tool is opened read-only - just be careful, esp. if filtering.

param.name: sortlist
param.description: List of columns to sort by Default: none

param.name: taql
param.shortdescription: TaQL query string for prefiltering the table.
param.description:
TaQL query string for prefiltering the table. Default: none
Example: taql="ANTENNA2 < 6

param.name: skipcols
param.description:
Columns to NOT display. Default: none
Example: skipcols='feed1, feed2'

task.example:
For more information, see the task pages of browsetable in CASA Docs:
https://casa.nrao.edu/casadocs/
